title: Mobile Learning Strategies for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Most learners own smartphones, and non-real-time learning progresses through a mobile application integrated with the LMS. Learning effectiveness is continuously monitored via formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can watch nursing practice video content and complete quizzes at least three times per week using mobile devices
Learners can interact with peers and instructors at least twice weekly via mobile discussion boards within the LMS
Learners can analyze simulation scenarios provided through a mobile app to develop nursing intervention plans
Learners can self-evaluate the usability (convenience) and usefulness (effectiveness) of mobile learning tools through surveys
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
